data.title: Apple's iPhone 15 event kicks off on Tuesday. Here's what to expect
data.description: Apple is hoping that its new iPhones can bust a sales slump, fend off renewed competition from Huawei, and persuade owners of Android phones to switch.

data.title: Concerns about Apple in China hit two other Club stocks. Here's where we stand on all three
data.description: Club holding Apple (AAPL) isn't in danger of losing its footing, despite a recent market sell-off spurred by reports China is cracking down on iPhone usage.

data.title: Apple could be about to make the biggest change to the iPhone in 11 years
data.description: Apple is set to unveil the iPhone 15 in just a few days, and it's widely expected to come with a significant change.

data.title: Apple voices support for California climate bill proposing strict emissions reporting
data.description: Apple sent a letter to Scott Wiener, a California senator, voicing its strong support for including supply chain (Scope 3) emissions in climate disclosures.
